page.title: 04Gelston Estate
page.content: Gelston Estate is a 4000 acre estate. It is split into 4 farms which all have different tenants. The estate was established, as it is now in 1952 when both ends of the estate were amalgamated. Not including farmworkers there are seventeen other workers, five foresters, two gamekeepers, seven estate farm workers, one manager, one secretary, one gardener/handyman. 25% of the estate is covered by forestry. The main breed of beef cattle is Blue Grey cattle. The breed of sheep they use is Grey Faced Cross Ewes.
